As for the method of swallowing a snake,
the first version says:
It is like a person eating and swallowing a snake's shadow.
They think it is a snake.
And it becomes an illness.
Other people ask about it, knowing the source of the illness.
They then secretly use a dead snake as medicine.
Placing it in the patient's diarrhea basin.
Announcing that the snake has come out.
The illness is then cured.
It is the same as a snake's shadow painted on a wall entering a wine cup.
As the Ä€gamas say:
In ÅšrÄvastÄ« there was an elder named Morning Dweller.
He had a maid who was extremely ugly.
She was always sent outside to do things like cut firewood, draw water, and so on.
Outside the field, there was a spring with a tree above it.
On the tree, there was a beautiful woman.
She hanged herself to death.
Her reflection appeared in the spring.
The maid saw it and thought it was her own reflection.
She then became angry with the mistress, saying,
I am so beautiful, yet you make me work in the fields and gardens.
She then smashed the jar and returned home to sit in the jeweled curtain in the hall.
The mistress thought she was having a psychotic episode and asked her about it.
The maid answered with the above story.
Why don't you recognize me, mistress? Why don't you treat me better?
She was then given a mirror to look at and saw her ugly form.
She still did not believe it and said the mirror was ugly.
The mistress, who already knew about the dead woman in the spring water,
sent her to the spring.
Seeing the dead woman's reflection, she was ashamed and felt remorse.
As for the contemplation of the mind,
it is also like the great master of Nanyue's painful swelling and full illness.
Using the power of contemplation, the illness was pushed away and cured.

As for the method of treating toothache,
the first version says:
Facing the Big Dipper, chant the mantra, saying:
If the teeth and gums ache, use the Big Dipper to treat it.
When the pain is gone, you will know by yourself.
The pain will then be relieved.
Also, use a dog's tooth to face the sunny side from the shady side and chant the mantra, saying:
Make the person's toothache go away.
If it doesn't go away, I will punish you.
When it goes away, return to the original.
The pain will then be relieved.
As for pinching the thumb to treat the liver, etc.,
the five fingers are the masters of the five internal organs.
Therefore, the thumb is the master of the liver.
The index finger is the master of the lungs.
The middle finger governs the heart.ğŸ”½The ring finger governs the spleen.
The little finger governs the kidneys.

Hitting forty or fifty times with pain
Is to make the mind stop at the painful place.
Like people in the Jiang region who suddenly suffer.
They all hit their arms with their hands one to two hundred times.
The pain is then relieved.
Next, clarifying the harm and benefit.ğŸ”½The mind is sharp and the illness is light, with sudden benefit.
The mind is sharp and the illness is serious, with gradual benefit.ğŸ”½The mind is dull and the illness is light, with gradual harm.
The mind is dull and the illness is serious, with sudden harm.
Moreover, although the mind is dull and skillfully understands the method of contemplation,
It can also achieve the gradual and sudden benefits.

As for the phrase the ordinary people,
the ordinary people are the common folk.
They are not extraordinary people.
The Guangya says:
They are foolish.
As for the rhyme and so on,ğŸ”½it is like Zhuang Bo stopping his axe for the people of Ying.
Bo Ya broke his strings for Ziqi.
Therefore, Seng Biao's poem says:
The Zhongqi cannot be encountered, who distinguishes the subtle mind?
If Zhongqi heard Bo Ya playing the mountain tune, he said:
It is lofty and radiant.
Hearing the water tune played, he said:
It fills the ears.

Therefore, it is known that if the sound and rhyme are lofty and harmonious, there will certainly be few who appreciate it. Now that the Dharma is subtle, those who believe in it are also rare.Here is the corrected and aligned text:
